title: Launcher will not start at all
body:
Been trying to get on League all day, however, when I try to open the client, I get this and it will not move any further than this. Help please.

EDIT: I've also tried to reinstall the game but I end up with the same result.

replies.body:
Have you waited around five minutes for it to load? Some computer might even take ten to do it.

What's happening here is that it's downloading and installing the patcher, and that could take a while.
It took a long time but it finally worked using your method. However, now I have another problem. http://puu.sh/fFXEl/a7c524ba93.jpg The download will not progress at all lol...

Please avoid uploading screenshots to another site and then linking from the boards. We have a perfectly functional attachment service here.

So, do you get any errors appearing when the downloading stops? Or does it just remain at 0kbps without any error message?

Hey JohnnxD,

Can you try turning off your firewall/Anti Virus. I have seen in the past those 2 items stop our patcher and/or game from updating/launcihg correctly.

If that does fix your issue, can you please post back here and let me know what Anti Virus you are using. I would like to look into this further if required.

-ToxicHawk
I've disabled both my firewall and my Anti Virus (Avast) but the problem still persists. :/
